numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Many people who are 15 years old to 24 years old believe that the world is changing for the better with each generation.
2. I wonder why many older people disagree with people who are 15 years old to 24 years old about the future.
3. Older people were brought up in a different way than younger people.
4. Older people may see things differently than people who were raised in more recent years.
5. The United States is one of the highest countries in the graph.
6. This suggests that the United States is evolving over time.
7. This suggests that people in the United States create more opportunities for themselves over time.
9. Life for a person in the teens or in the twenties seems to improve over time.
10. Can the same be said for an older person?
